description: (1) Installation of internally illuminated projecting box sign at fascia level on Epworth Street frontage  and two non-illuminated signs below fascia level adjoining vehicle entrance on Epworth Street frontage  and repainting sign over that entrance. (2) Installation of two internally illuminated signs on Clere Street entrance canopy and non-illuminated warning sign in forceourt area and repainting sign over vehicle entrance all on Clere Street elevation.
decision_conditions: any advertisements displayed, and any site used for the display of advertisements, shall be maintained in a clean and tidy condition to the reasonable satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.
